abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units in a 900 radius.
abilities.notes: Bounces to any enemy units affected by Track within range. The bounce has no limit.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his attack carefully, dealing critical damage and stealing gold on his next attack. Autocast enabled by default.
abilities.notes: Gold is stolen directly from the enemy hero's unreliable gold.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. When attacking to break the invisibility, Bounty Hunter stuns his target.
abilities.notes: Breaking invisibility with an attack applies a stun to the target.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, providing True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty.
abilities.notes: Tracked units are visible through fog of war and invisibility. If a tracked unit dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby allies receive bonus gold.

innate_abilities.name: Big Game Hunter
innate_abilities.description: Bounty Hunter receives additional gold when killing or assisting in killing enemies with kill streaks.
innate_abilities.notes: Increases gold received from ending kill streaks by 20%.
